main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted near Philadelphia, Pennsylvania on June 8, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as a flat, elongated, triangular disc similar in size to a shirt button,The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes,The object climbed steadily, hovered, then moved backward before disappearing, The object was observed from the ground without optical aids, Other conclusions suggested were that it might be a balloon or aircraft.
witness description: Civilian, age 38, employed by the Photo Corporation as a Technical Illustrator
